text: Fusinus stannum is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk. It is in the family Fasciolariidae, which includes the spindle snails and tulip snails. The species was discovered in Indo-Pacific islands including Phuket Island, Andaman Islands, and Nicobar Islands. The new species was declared in 2008. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * stannum Category:Gastropods described in 2008
title: Fusinus stannum
